My Projects

Github Finder

This application is a Responsive React Github Finder that has a deal with Github API and we can search for Github users. We have a search component,users comoponent and a user item comonent inside of it. In this application I used the lastest feature of React 2019 that includes (Context,Hooks,MDBReact,React Router)

Video Project Github

React SpaceX Rocket

Website shows a list of missions that have been launched. some are red (fail) and some are Green (success) and by clicking on each launch you can see the details of launches Used GraphQl and Express to build server and Fetch Api from SpaceX data, to build the client Side I used React js, Bootstrap, and Apollo to fetch data.

Video Github

Threedy.ai

This is an informational responsive website which presents information about the company’s product, the latest updates and team members profiles. I created this website from scratch using React.js and made sure to take into account all the feedback from the eng and ux team.

Project Github

MoviesApp

Utilizes stable release SDK-version 27 for libraries Gradle and Android Studio, retrofit for fetch Data operates Firebase to register and sign into and handle the loading and caching of images Displays images in a circular shape using ​CircleImageView The Movies DB API Support libraries for material design and ​RecyclerView shows list in the same format.
